Package spaceship

Class Ship

  • java.lang.Object
    • spaceship.Ship
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Enterprise
    public class Ship
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents the Ship class. Ships allow Crew to fly to new planets. Ships have a shield variable that will decrease as the ship takes value during events throughout the game, and will increase when a CrewMember conducts repairs on the ship. If the ship's health variable falls to 0 during a game then the game is over as the ship has been destroyed.
    Author:
    ctg31, mch221
